00030 #include <qnamespace.h>
00031 #include "qoccviewercontext.h"
00032 #include "qoccinternal.h"
00033 
00034 QoccViewerContext::QoccViewerContext()
00035 {
00036         // Create the OCC Viewers
00037         TCollection_ExtendedString a3DName("Visual3D");
00038         myViewer = createViewer( "DISPLAY", a3DName.ToExtString(), "", 1000.0 );
00039         myViewer->Init();
00040         myViewer->SetZBufferManagment(Standard_False);
00041         myViewer->SetDefaultViewProj( V3d_Zpos );       // Top view
00042         myContext = new AIS_InteractiveContext( myViewer );
00043 
00044         myGridType       = Aspect_GT_Rectangular;
00045         myGridMode       = Aspect_GDM_Lines;
00046         myGridColor      = Quantity_NOC_RED4;
00047         myGridTenthColor = Quantity_NOC_GRAY90;
00048 
00049         myContext->SetHilightColor(Quantity_NOC_WHITE) ;
00050 
00051         setGridOffset (0.0);
00052         gridXY();
00053         gridOn();
00054 }
00055

00058 {
00059 
00060 }
00061 
00062 Handle_V3d_Viewer& QoccViewerContext::getViewer()  
00063 { 
00064         return myViewer; 
00065 }
00066 
00067 Handle_AIS_InteractiveContext& QoccViewerContext::getContext() 
00068 { 
00069         return myContext; 
00070 }
00071 
00072 Handle_V3d_Viewer QoccViewerContext::createViewer(      const Standard_CString aDisplay,
00073                                                                                                         const Standard_ExtString aName,
00074                                                                                                         const Standard_CString aDomain,
00075                                                                                                         const Standard_Real ViewSize )
00076 {
00077 #ifndef WNT
00078     static Handle(Graphic3d_GraphicDevice) defaultdevice;
00079         
00080     if( defaultdevice.IsNull() )
00081         {
00082                 defaultdevice = new Graphic3d_GraphicDevice( getenv(aDisplay) );
00083         }
00084 
00085     return new V3d_Viewer(      defaultdevice,
00086                                                         aName,
00087                                                         aDomain,
00088                                                         ViewSize,
00089                                                         V3d_XposYnegZpos,
00090                                                         Quantity_NOC_BLACK,
00091                                 V3d_ZBUFFER,
00092                                                         V3d_GOURAUD,
00093                                                         V3d_WAIT );
00094 #else
00095     static Handle( Graphic3d_WNTGraphicDevice ) defaultdevice;
00096     if( defaultdevice.IsNull() )
00097         {
00098         defaultdevice = new Graphic3d_WNTGraphicDevice();
00099         }
00100 
00101     return new V3d_Viewer(      defaultdevice,
00102                                                         aName,
00103                                                         aDomain,
00104                                                         ViewSize,
00105                                                         V3d_XposYnegZpos,
00106                                                         Quantity_NOC_BLACK,
00107                                 V3d_ZBUFFER,
00108                                                         V3d_GOURAUD,
00109                                                         V3d_WAIT );
00110 #endif  // WNT
00111 }
00118 void QoccViewerContext::deleteAllObjects()
00119 {
00120         myContext->CloseAllContexts();          //mark 1-29-09 - fix segfault on slotNeutralSelection when File|New had been clicked while a local context was open and something was selected
00121         AIS_ListOfInteractive aList;
00122         myContext->DisplayedObjects( aList );
00123         AIS_ListIteratorOfListOfInteractive aListIterator;
00124         for ( aListIterator.Initialize( aList ); aListIterator.More(); aListIterator.Next() )
00125         {
00126                 myContext->Remove( aListIterator.Value(), Standard_False);
00127         }
00128 }
00132 void QoccViewerContext::gridXY  ( void )
00133 {
00134         myGridColor      = Quantity_NOC_RED4;
00135         myViewer->Grid()->SetColors( myGridColor, myGridTenthColor );
00136         gp_Ax3 aPlane(gp_Pnt( 0., 0., 0. ),gp_Dir(0., 0., 1.));
00137         myViewer->SetPrivilegedPlane( aPlane );
00138 }
00145 void QoccViewerContext::gridXZ  ( void )
00146 {
00147         myGridColor      = Quantity_NOC_BLUE4;
00148         myViewer->Grid()->SetColors( myGridColor, myGridTenthColor );
00149         gp_Ax3 aPlane( gp_Pnt(0., 0., 0.),gp_Dir(0., -1., 0.) );
00150         myViewer->SetPrivilegedPlane( aPlane );
00151 }
00155 void QoccViewerContext::gridYZ  ( void )
00156 {
00157         myGridColor      = Quantity_NOC_GREEN4;
00158         myViewer->Grid()->SetColors( myGridColor, myGridTenthColor );
00159         gp_Ax3 aPlane( gp_Pnt( 0., 0., 0.), gp_Dir( 1., 0., 0. ) );
00160         myViewer->SetPrivilegedPlane( aPlane );
00161 }
00162 
00166 void QoccViewerContext::gridOn  ( void )
00167 {
00168         myViewer->ActivateGrid( myGridType , myGridMode );
00169         myViewer->SetGridEcho ( Standard_True );
00170 }
00171 
00175 void QoccViewerContext::gridOff ( void )
00176 {
00177         myViewer->DeactivateGrid();
00178         myViewer->SetGridEcho( Standard_False );
00179 }
00180 
00184 void QoccViewerContext::gridRect ( void )
00185 {
00186         myGridType = Aspect_GT_Rectangular;
00187         myViewer->ActivateGrid( myGridType , myGridMode );
00188         myViewer->Grid()->SetColors( myGridColor, myGridTenthColor );
00189 }
00193 void QoccViewerContext::gridCirc ( void )
00194 {
00195         myGridType = Aspect_GT_Circular;
00196         myViewer->ActivateGrid( myGridType , myGridMode );
00197         myViewer->Grid()->SetColors( myGridColor, myGridTenthColor );
00198 }
00199 
00200 void QoccViewerContext::setGridOffset (Quantity_Length offset)
00201 {
00202         Quantity_Length radius;
00203         Quantity_Length xSize, ySize;
00204         Quantity_Length oldOffset;
00205         
00206         myViewer->CircularGridGraphicValues( radius, oldOffset );
00207         myViewer->SetCircularGridGraphicValues( radius, offset);
00208 
00209         myViewer->RectangularGridGraphicValues(xSize, ySize, oldOffset);
00210         myViewer->SetRectangularGridGraphicValues(xSize, ySize, offset);
00211 }
